title: Frying pan

properties.value: The frying pan is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To wield it the player must have completed five Recipe for Disaster subquests and have 20 Attack. Despite having the same stats as the mithril warhammer, it was not updated in the first 2021 equipment rebalance to have a Strength level requirement.

Item ID7441

The frying pan is a melee kitchen weapon that can be bought from the Culinaromancer's chest. To wield it the player must have completed five Recipe for Disaster subquests and have 20 Attack. Despite having the same stats as the mithril warhammer, it was not updated in the first 2021 equipment rebalance to have a Strength level requirement.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When using the Skillcape emote of Cooking, a frying pan similar to this is used.

[[File:Frying pan detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''frying pan''' is a [[melee]] [[kitchen weapon]] that can be bought from the [[Culinaromancer's chest]]. To wield it the player must have completed five [[Recipe for Disaster]] subquests and have 20 [[Attack]]. Despite having the same stats as the [[mithril warhammer]], it was not updated in the [[Update:Fishing Trawler Improvements and Equipment Rebalance: Part One|first 2021 equipment rebalance]] to have a [[Strength]] level requirement.
